page.title: 15Coach Service, Hilton
page.content: Starting as a small family firm just after the first world war with a horse and cart. A few years later the first motorised coach was bought. Hilton Coach Service now run seven coaches. A orkers coach starts from Hilton at 7.45 a.m. through Ansty to dorchester, returning at 5.30 p.m. Other coaches ae used for shopping trips to Dorchester and on thursdays a coach goes to Blandford for the weekly markets. The service is very popular with many organisations in the area for their coach outings to various parts of the country as it is run by frienly and reliable people with excellent drivin records.
